external_games.name: Minecraft x Crocs: Choose Your Mode

name: Minecraft x Crocs: Choose Your Mode
summary: Minecraft x Crocs: Choose Your Mode was a promotional browser-mobile game that was made as a part of a collaboration deal between Crocs and Minecraft. The game featured 2 augmented reality games based on Minecraft, Crocs Creator and Crocs Crossing.

videos.name: Case Study
videos.title: 'Choose Your Mode: Minecraft X Crocs' Case Study (May 2023)
